Sentencas: A novel dual chamber (DC) measurement cell has been implemented for simultaneous monitoring of crystallographic and electrochemical (EC) properties of Ni-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta (Ni-GDC) solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) anode at different fuel cell polarizations.
Titulo: Simultaneous Operando Characterization of Crystallographic and Electrochemical Properties of Ni-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-δ Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The influence of system parameters (temperature, oxygen partial pressure in anode compartment and oxide ion flux through the electrolyte membrane from the cathode to the anode) on the crystallographic structure of GDC and redox performance of Ni has been studied.
Titulo: Simultaneous Operando Characterization of Crystallographic and Electrochemical Properties of Ni-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-δ Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The oxide ion flux through the membrane from cathode to anode leads to increase of oxygen partial pressure in anode layers close to electrolyte.
Titulo: Simultaneous Operando Characterization of Crystallographic and Electrochemical Properties of Ni-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-δ Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: Increase of oxygen partial pressure leads to decrease of unit cell volume of the GDC lattice.
Titulo: Simultaneous Operando Characterization of Crystallographic and Electrochemical Properties of Ni-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-δ Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The observed average change of GDC lattice parameter was 0.0147 angstrom V-1 at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Simultaneous Operando Characterization of Crystallographic and Electrochemical Properties of Ni-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-δ Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The oxidation of Ni caused by oxide ion flux at high fuel cell loads has been detected electrochemically but not from XRD results.
Titulo: Simultaneous Operando Characterization of Crystallographic and Electrochemical Properties of Ni-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-δ Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode
